title: Ticket #4044: RFE: report the current/active ImageSize
description:
ImageSize increases as a job uses more memory, but it can never decrease due to code in the shadow.

An eviction expression on execution nodes gets triggered when the available memory on a host drops below a certain threshold. The jobs that are targeted first for eviction are those whose ImageSize are the most out of bounds with regards to their RequestedMemory. A current ImageSize of the job as opposed to the high-water mark from a previous attempt would provide better control.

RFE is for a new ImageSize attribute that reports the current/active ImageSize of a job.
remarks: Consensus with customer that this RFE is obsoleted by cgroups functionality. I'm abandoning this tkt.
